mapper.select: SELECT vendor_id FROM vendor WHERE member_id = #{memberId} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.contract_id, v.vendor_name, p.product_name, p.base_price, c.contract_price, c.min_order_qty, c.lead_time, c.contract_status, c.contract_start_date, c.contract_end_date, v.vendor_id, v.vendor_tax_id, v.vendor_status, p.product_id, p.unit_quantity, p.unit_spec, p.store_type, tc.category_id AS top_category_id, tc.category_name AS top_category_name, cgy.category_id AS category_id, cgy.category_name AS category_name, c.created_at, c.modified_at FROM contract c JOIN vendor v ON c.vendor_id = v.vendor_id JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN category cgy ON p.category_id = cgy.category_id JOIN category tc ON cgy.top_category_id = tc.category_id WHERE c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.contract_id = #{contractId}
AND c.vendor_id = #{vendorId}
